faqs.question: What kind of legal documentation should I verify before finalizing a Plot For Sale in Sector 67A
faqs.answer: It is crucial to verify several key documents to ensure clear title and minimize risks. Key checks include the Title Deed and its chain of ownership history, ensuring the seller has the legal right to transfer the property. You must also check the RERA registration status if applicable, especially for plots within integrated townships. Verify the demarcation certificate, mutation record, and ensure all property taxes and utility bills have been paid up-to-date. If the plot falls under a specific government scheme like DDJAY, confirm the approval status and any associated construction timeline mandates. Our legal team provides comprehensive due diligence reports for every plot we list.
